languages.text: {n}Из толпы еретиков раздается встревоженный вскрик. Похоже, ваши манипуляции с алтарем привлекли внимание кого-то проницательного, чей глаз не обманула ваша маскировка.{/n}
{n}An alarmed cry is heard from the crowd of heretics. It looks like your tampering with the altar has caught the attention of someone too keen-eyed to be fooled by your disguise.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Из толпы еретиков раздается встревоженный вскрик. Похоже, ваши манипуляции с алтарем привлекли внимание кого-то проницательного, чей глаз не обманула ваша маскировка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A cry of alarm is heard from the crowd of heretics. It looks like your tampering with the altar has caught the attention of someone too keen-eyed to be fooled by your disguise.{/n}
{n}A cry of alarm is heard from the crowd of heretics. It looks like your tampering with the altar has caught the attention of someone too keen-eyed to be fooled by your disguise.{/n}

{n}An alarmed cry is heard from the crowd of heretics. It looks like your tampering with the altar has caught the attention of someone too keen-eyed to be fooled by your disguise.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein alarmierter Ruf ertönt aus der Masse der Ketzer. Deine Manipulation des Altars hat offenbar die Aufmerksamkeit eines Kultisten geweckt, der zu scharfe Augen hat, um sich von deiner Verkleidung täuschen zu lassen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An alarmed cry is heard from the crowd of heretics. It looks like your tampering with the altar has caught the attention of someone too keen-eyed to be fooled by your disguise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein alarmierter Ruf ertönt aus der Masse der Ketzer. Deine Manipulation des Altars hat offenbar die Aufmerksamkeit eines Kultisten geweckt, der zu scharfe Augen hat, um sich von deiner Verkleidung täuschen zu lassen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un cri d'alarme retentit dans la foule des hérétiques. Votre manipulation de l'autel semble avoir attiré l'attention de quelqu'un de suffisamment observateur pour avoir éventé votre déguisement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An alarmed cry is heard from the crowd of heretics. It looks like your tampering with the altar has caught the attention of someone too keen-eyed to be fooled by your disguise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un cri d'alarme retentit dans la foule des hérétiques. Votre manipulation de l'autel semble avoir attiré l'attention de quelqu'un de suffisamment observateur pour avoir éventé votre déguisement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}异端分子之中传来了一声尖叫，看来你摆弄祭坛的行为引起了某个人的注意。那个人眼力很好，你的伪装没能瞒得过他。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An alarmed cry is heard from the crowd of heretics. It looks like your tampering with the altar has caught the attention of someone too keen-eyed to be fooled by your disguise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}异端分子之中传来了一声尖叫，看来你摆弄祭坛的行为引起了某个人的注意。那个人眼力很好，你的伪装没能瞒得过他。{/n}

languages.text: {n}異端者達の集団の中から危険を知らせる叫び声が聞こえる。祭壇をみだりにいじったせいで、目ざとい何者かに変装がバレてしまったようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An alarmed cry is heard from the crowd of heretics. It looks like your tampering with the altar has caught the attention of someone too keen-eyed to be fooled by your disguise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異端者達の集団の中から危険を知らせる叫び声が聞こえる。祭壇をみだりにいじったせいで、目ざとい何者かに変装がバレてしまったようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se oye un grito alarmado de la multitud de herejes. Parece que la alteración del altar ha llamado la atención de alguien demasiado perspicaz para dejarse engañar por tu disfraz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An alarmed cry is heard from the crowd of heretics. It looks like your tampering with the altar has caught the attention of someone too keen-eyed to be fooled by your disguise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se oye un grito alarmado de la multitud de herejes. Parece que la alteración del altar ha llamado la atención de alguien demasiado perspicaz para dejarse engañar por tu disfraz.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kâfir kalabalığından bir alarm haykırışı yükseliyor. Anlaşılan gözü keskin birisi, üzerine geçirdiğin sahte kılığa kanmayarak sunağı kurcaladığını fark etmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An alarmed cry is heard from the crowd of heretics. It looks like your tampering with the altar has caught the attention of someone too keen-eyed to be fooled by your disguise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kâfir kalabalığından bir haykırış yükseliyor. Sahte kılığına kanmamış, gözü keskin birisi, sunağa dokunduğunu fark etmiş olmalı.{/n}
